name: The Greatest Estate Developer
author: Moon Baek Kyung
content: When civil engineering student Suho Kim falls asleep reading a fantasy novel, he wakes up as a character in the book. Suho is now in the body of Lloyd Frontera, a lazy noble who loves to drink, and whose family is in a mountain of debt. Using his engineering knowledge, Suho designs inventions to avert the terrible future that lies in wait for him. With the help of a giant hamster, a knight, and the worldâ€™s magic, can Suho dig his new family out of debt and build a better future?
